title: Sleeveless A-Line Midi Dress with Botanical Print
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a sleeveless A-line midi dress, soft drape, scoop neckline, botanical floral print in muted tones, lightweight cotton sateen fabric, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and trims
techpack: Sleeveless A-line midi dress in cotton sateen with botanical floral print. Scoop neckline finished with bias binding. Invisible zipper closure at center back. Self-fabric waist tie attached at side seams. Fully lined with lightweight cotton voile. Hem finished with double fold stitch.
provenance: Designed by combining garment:dress and sleeve:Sleeveless/Tank from provided trend attributes.
design_text:
Sleeveless A-Line Midi Dress with Botanical Print (DRESS-SLVLS-001)
Colors: sage green, soft cream, dusty rose, warm taupe
Fabrics: cotton sateen, lining: lightweight cotton voile
Prints/Patterns: botanical floral print
Garment Type: dress
Silhouette: A-line
Sleeves: sleeveless/tank
Neckline: scoop
Length: midi
Style / Fit: r, e, g, u, l, a, r,  , f, i, t
Trims & details: invisible back zipper, self-fabric waist tie, topstitching along neckline and armholes
Techpack: available
